mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER VALUES ( MEMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{memberPwd}, #{authProvider}, #{nickname}, #{gender}, #{birthdate}, #{email}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, SYSDATE, '0', 'N', #{memberProfile} )
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO AS memberNo, MEMBER_ID AS memberId, MEMBER_PWD AS memberPwd, AUTH_PROVIDER AS authProvider, NICKNAME AS nickname, GENDER AS gender, BIRTHDATE AS birthdate, EMAIL AS email, ADDRESS AS address, ADDRESS_DETAIL AS addressDetail, ENROLL_DATE AS enrollDate, MEMBER_STATUS AS memberStatus, DOG_YN AS dogYN, MEMBER_PROFILE AS memberProfile FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{value}

SELECT MEMBER_NO AS memberNo, MEMBER_ID AS memberId, MEMBER_PWD AS memberPwd, AUTH_PROVIDER AS authProvider, NICKNAME AS nickname, GENDER AS gender, BIRTHDATE AS birthdate, EMAIL AS email, ADDRESS AS address, ADDRESS_DETAIL AS addressDetail, ENROLL_DATE AS enrollDate, MEMBER_STATUS AS memberStatus, DOG_YN AS dogYN, MEMBER_PROFILE AS memberProfile FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{memberId} AND MEMBER_PWD=#{memberPwd}

SELECT MEMBER_NO AS memberNo, MEMBER_ID AS memberId, MEMBER_PWD AS memberPwd, AUTH_PROVIDER AS authProvider, NICKNAME AS nickname, GENDER AS gender, BIRTHDATE AS birthdate, EMAIL AS email, ADDRESS AS address, ADDRESS_DETAIL AS addressDetail, ENROLL_DATE AS enrollDate, MEMBER_STATUS AS memberStatus, DOG_YN AS dogYN, MEMBER_PROFILE AS memberProfile FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL=#{value}

SELECT E.MEMBER_NO memberNo, E.SEND_DATE sendDate, M.MEMBER_ID memberId, TO_CHAR(M.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY" /" MM" /" DD') enrollDate, TO_NUMBER(CASE WHEN TRUNC((SYSDATE - E.SEND_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60) < 180 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) timegap FROM ( SELECT MEMBER_NO, MAX(SEND_DATE) SEND_DATE FROM Email_Auth_Hist WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND RANDOM_NO = #{findIdCode} GROUP BY MEMBER_NO ) E INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = E.MEMBER_NO

SELECT MEMBER_NO AS memberNo, MEMBER_ID AS memberId, MEMBER_PWD AS memberPwd, AUTH_PROVIDER AS authProvider, NICKNAME AS nickname, GENDER AS gender, BIRTHDATE AS birthdate, EMAIL AS email, ADDRESS AS address, ADDRESS_DETAIL AS addressDetail, ENROLL_DATE AS enrollDate, MEMBER_STATUS AS memberStatus, DOG_YN AS dogYN, MEMBER_PROFILE AS memberProfile FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{memberId} AND EMAIL=#{email}
